Text: Monterrey Legal Risk memo Cc a slightly revised risk memo from the one I showed you yesterday As we discussed I have reduced the risk rating to a The only other change is that I clarified that we will still need IDB approval for a sale of our remaining Although this is not a new risk created by this transaction the earlier language about transfer restrictions could have left the reader with the impression that we no longer needed IDB approval once we went down to Please call if you have any questions
